rp_10_30_greet.text: Hi! This seemed like a nice place to eat.

rp_10_40_first_time.text: Yep first time I've enterred the place.

rp_10_40_customer_initiates.text: I was thinking about getting a slice.

rp_10_40_insulted.text: I'm not sure I like this place or you.

rp_10_50_rude.text: That's not a nice way to greet a customer! Anyway, I'd like a slice with no drink, but I can't decide on the topping. What do you suggest?

rp_10_60_offeredhelp.text: I'd like a slice with no drink, but I can't decide on the topping. What do you suggest?

rp_10_85_impatient.text: Are you gonna take my order or something?

rp_10_86_fed_up.text: The service here stinks. I'm gone.

rp_20_99_decided_full.text: Yeah, thats about right. I'll have a slice of sausage and mushroom.

rp_20_99_decided_mushrooms.text: Mushrooms sound good. I'll have a slice of sausage and mushroom.

rp_20_99_decided_sausage.text: Sausage sounds perfect, but I want a veggie too.

rp_20_99_decided_meat_veg.text: Maybe one meat, one veggie?  I got it.  Sausage and one veggie?  Any suggestion on the veggie?

rp_20_99_considering_topping.text: Maybe just one meat and a veggie.

rp_20_99_considering_hawaiin.text: Yech- way too sweet for me.

rp_20_99_considering_crap.text: Maybe you like that type of thing, but that's not for me.

rp_20_99_considering_fish.text: Fish and pizza do not go together.
Fish and pizza do not go together.

rp_20_99_considering_dog.text: You gotta be joking, no one eats a dog pizza.

rp_20_99_considering_bird.text: Birds of a feather, flock together, and I will eat that pizza- NEVER!

rp_20_99_self_discovery.text: You know, I do not usually eat pizza so it has been a while, but lets see. How about sausage and a veggie?

rp_20_85_impatient.text: I just don't know what toppings.

rp_20_86_fed_up.text: I won't be visiting here again.  Good day.

rp_22_99_decided_mushroom.text: Yeah, thats about right. I'll have a slice of sausage and mushroom.

rp_22_99_wrong_toppings.text: Aren't you listening? I want sausage and a veggie.

rp_22_99_disgusted.text: I don't like your sense of humour.  Good day.

rp_22_99_veg.text: Almost. You know what I think? I'll have a slice of sausage and mushroom.

rp_30_99_time_to_reconsider.text: I'm changing my mind,  last time I had pizza, I think I had a bad reaction.  I'm suspicious it might be the gluten.

rp_30_99_considering_gluten.text: Now, come to think of it, last time I had pizza, I think I had a bad reaction.  I'm suspicious it might be the gluten.

rp_32_99_decided_noglut.text: A no gluten option? Oh, that's fantastic.  Lets do that!  Can you write up my order?

rp_32_99_fed_up.text: I guess this was a bad idea.  Thanks for your time.

rp_40_99_finished.text: Perfect.  I have to say I'm very pleased with the service here at Paizanos!

rp_990_20_complimented.text: Thanks. I got it at Brooks Brothers.

rp_990_21_complimented_too_much.text: Enough about me. Can we get on with my pizza?

rp_990_31_insulted_too_much.text: I think I'll go somewhere else for lunch.

rp_990_40_super_insulted.text: Fuck you and the horse you rode in on! I'm leaving!

rp_990_70_rude.text: Um, I not quite comfortable with that.

rp_990_80_hard_of_hearing.text: Excuse me. I'm a little hard of hearing. Can you speak more slowly and clearly, please?

rp_990_80_didnt_catch_that.text: Didn't catch that. Can you speak more slowly and clearly?

rp_990_86_fed_up.text: I wont be visiting here again.  Good day.
